00022 void usage()
00023 {
00024   cerr<<"usage: bridge device local|remote remotemacaddr otheraddrs*\n\n"
00025       <<"In local mode, packets sent to any of the ethernet addresses\n"
00026       <<"  and not originating from remotemacaddr\n"
00027       <<"  are serialized as RawEthernetPackets to stdout and any\n"
00028       <<"  RawEthernetPackets seen on stdin are written to the network\n"
00029       <<"In remote mode, packets received from any of the ethernet\n"
00030       <<"  addresses are serialized to stdout and any RawEthernetPackets\n"
00031       <<"  received from stdin are written to the network\n\n";
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 // bridge config
00036 char *device;
00037 deque<EthernetAddr> addresses;
00038 enum {LOCAL, REMOTE} config;
00039 
00040 
00041 // libnet stuff
00042 char net_errbuf[LIBNET_ERRORBUF_SIZE];
00043 #if LIBNET11
00044 libnet_t *net_interface;
00045 #else
00046 struct libnet_link_int *net_interface;
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 // libpcap stuff
00050 const int pcap_proglen=10240;
00051 char pcap_program[pcap_proglen];
00052 pcap_t *pcap_interface;
00053 char pcap_errbuf[PCAP_ERRBUF_SIZE];
00054 struct bpf_program pcap_filter;
00055 bpf_u_int32 pcap_net, pcap_mask;
00056 int pcap_fd;

00061 void Init()
00062 {
00063   // establish libnet session
00064 #if LIBNET11
00065   net_interface=libnet_init(LIBNET_LINK_ADV,device,net_errbuf);
00066 #else
00067   net_interface=libnet_open_link_interface(device,net_errbuf);
00068 #endif
00069   if (net_interface==NULL) {
00070     cerr<<"Can't open interface: "<<net_errbuf<<endl;
00071     exit(-1);
00072   }
00073 
00074   // establish pcap filter
00075   if (pcap_lookupnet(device,&pcap_net,&pcap_mask,pcap_errbuf)) {
00076     cerr<<"Can't get net and mask for "<<device<<": "<<pcap_errbuf<<endl;
00077     exit(-1);
00078   }
00079   cerr << "pcap_net="<<pcap_net<<", pcap_mask="<<pcap_mask<<endl;
00080   if ((pcap_interface=pcap_open_live(device,1518,1,0,pcap_errbuf))==NULL) {
00081     cerr<< "Can't open "<<device<<":"<<pcap_errbuf<<endl;
00082     exit(-1);
00083   }
00084   pcap_program[0]=0;
00085   char dir[5];
00086   EthernetAddrString addr;
00087   if (config==LOCAL) {
00088     strcpy(dir,"dst ");
00089   } else {
00090     strcpy(dir,"src ");
00091   }
00092   if (config==LOCAL) {
00093     (*(addresses.begin())).GetAsString(addr);
00094     sprintf(pcap_program,"(not ether src %s) and (",addr);
00095   }
00096   for (deque<EthernetAddr>::const_iterator i=addresses.begin();
00097        i!=addresses.end();
00098        ++i) {
00099     if (i!=addresses.begin()) {
00100       strcat(pcap_program," or ");
00101     }
00102     (*i).GetAsString(addr);
00103     strcat(pcap_program,"ether ");
00104     strcat(pcap_program,dir);
00105     strcat(pcap_program,addr);
00106   }
00107   if (config==LOCAL) {
00108     strcat(pcap_program,")");
00109   }
00110 
00111   cerr <<"pcap_program='"<<pcap_program<<"'"<<endl;
00112   if (pcap_compile(pcap_interface,&pcap_filter,pcap_program,0,pcap_mask)) {
00113     cerr<<"Can't compile filter\n";
00114     exit(-1);
00115   }
00116   if (pcap_setfilter(pcap_interface,&pcap_filter)) {
00117     cerr<<"Can't set filter\n";
00118     exit(-1);
00119   }
00120   pcap_fd=pcap_fileno(pcap_interface);
00121 }
00122 
00123 void ProcessPcap()
00124 {
00125   struct pcap_pkthdr header;
00126   const u_char *packet;
00127 
00128   packet=pcap_next(pcap_interface,&header);
00129 
00130   if (packet==NULL) {
00131     cerr <<"pcap_next returned a null pointer\n";
00132     exit(-1);
00133   }
00134 
00135   RawEthernetPacket p((const char *)packet,(unsigned)(header.len));
00136 
00137   cerr << (config==LOCAL ? "Local: " : "Remote: ") <<"Forwarding "<<p<<endl;
00138 
00139   p.Serialize(fileno(stdout));
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00143 void ProcessStdin()
00144 {
00145   RawEthernetPacket p;
00146 
00147   p.Unserialize(fileno(stdin));
00148 
00149 
00150   cerr << (config==LOCAL ? "Local: " : "Remote: ") << "Emitting "<<p<<endl;
00151 
00152 #if LIBNET11
00153   if (libnet_adv_write_link(net_interface,
00154                               (u_char *)(p.data),
00155                               p.size)<0) {
00156 #else
00157   if (libnet_write_link_layer(net_interface,
00158                               (const char *)device,
00159                               (u_char *)(p.data),
00160                               p.size)<0) {
00161 #endif
00162       cerr << "Can't write output packet to link\n";
00163       exit(-1);
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 void Run()
00169 {
00170   fd_set fds;
00171 
00172   while (1) {
00173     FD_ZERO(&fds);
00174     FD_SET(pcap_fd,&fds);
00175     FD_SET(0,&fds);
00176     int rc=select(pcap_fd+1,&fds,0,0,0);
00177     if (rc<0) {
00178       if (errno==EINTR) {
00179         // shouldn't happen on linux, but can happen on solaris
00180         continue;
00181       }
00182     } else if (rc==0) {
00183       // huh? didn't ask for timeouts so just repeat
00184       continue;
00185     } else {
00186       if (FD_ISSET(0,&fds)) {
00187         ProcessStdin();
00188       }
00189       if (FD_ISSET(pcap_fd,&fds)) {
00190         ProcessPcap();
00191       }
00192     }
00193   }
00194 }

00200 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00201 {
00202 
00203   if (argc<4) {
00204     usage();
00205     return -1;
00206   }
00207 
00208   device=argv[1];
00209 
00210   if (toupper(argv[2][0])=='L') {
00211     config=LOCAL;
00212   } else if (toupper(argv[2][0])=='R') {
00213     config=REMOTE;
00214   } else {
00215     usage();
00216     return -1;
00217   }
00218 
00219   cerr << "Configured as a "<<(config==LOCAL ? "local" : "remote")
00220        <<" bridge on "<<device<<" serving:";
00221 
00222   for (int i=3;i<argc;i++) {
00223     addresses.push_back(EthernetAddr(argv[i]));
00224     cerr <<" "<<EthernetAddr(argv[i]);
00225   }
00226 
00227   cerr << endl;
00228 
00229   Init();
00230   Run();
00231 }
